title: Scary Action And Ambient Music Pack
description: 'Scary Action And Ambient Music Pack' - 6 scary ambient, 5 scary action and 7 bonus loopable tracks for different kinds of commercial and non-commercial games, films etc.
longDescription:
'Scary Action And Ambient Music Pack' - 5 scary action, 6 scary ambient and 7 bonus loopable tracks for different kinds of commercial and non-commercial games, films and other projects.

Click ->HERE<- to listen all tracks on YouTube

Scary Action Tracks:

  • Scary Action Orchestral Music1 (2 minutes 29 seconds)
  • Scary Action Orchestral Music2 (2 minutes 30 seconds)
  • Scary Action Orchestral Music3 (2 minutes 28 seconds)
  • Scary Action Orchestral Music4 (2 minutes 21 seconds)
  • Scary Action Orchestral Music5 (2 minutes 29 seconds)

Scary Ambient Tracks:

  • Scary Ambient Orchestral Music1 (2 minutes 22 seconds)
  • Scary Ambient Orchestral Music2 (1 minute 30 seconds)
  • Scary Ambient Orchestral Music3 (2 minutes 25seconds)
  • Scary Ambient Strings Music1 (2 minutes 32 seconds)
  • Scary Ambient Strings Music2 (2 minutes 49 seconds)
  • Scary Ambient Strings Music3 (2 minutes 30 seconds)

Bonus Tracks:

  • Ambient Mysterious Piano Music1 (57 seconds)
  • Ambient Mysterious Piano Music2 (1 minute 10 seconds)
  • Ambient Mysterious Piano Music3 (56 seconds)
  • Ambient Mysterious Piano Music4 (1 minute 54 seconds)
  • Ambient Mysterious Piano Music5 (1 minute 22 seconds)
  • Heroic Action Orchestral Music (1 minute 27 seconds)
  • Mysterious Action Orchestral Music (2 minutes 53 seconds)
technicalDetails:
